DOC.brief_title: The Effect Short Educational Program Young Women 's Knowledge Beliefs About Osteoporosis
DOC.detailed_description: Objective . To determine effect short osteoporosis educational program young woman â€™ knowledge beliefs osteoporosis . Methods . Ten college physical activity class enrol 133 predominantly Caucasian woman ( age range 18 21 year ) randomize osteoporosis educational program control . Knowledge beliefs osteoporosis assess baseline one week three week follow intervention use Multiple Osteoporosis Prevention Survey . Knowledge define ability identify correctly osteoporosis risk factor . Beliefs measure use five point Likert type scale . The educational program comprise lecture print material develop National Osteoporosis Foundation . Chi-square analysis variance evaluate group difference . Alpha set 0.05 .
DOC.criteria: Women enrol midatlantic college physical activity course Unable partake three survey 's one educational lesson
